channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] VCF as a Service - Cloud Director Site (vmware.directorsite) was made available in the London catalog
[updated] Watson Machine Learning (pm-20) has changed the description of the plan named lite
item.description:
*before*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens used. For details on CUH rates and foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/ml-plans
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens, *after*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens used. For details on CUH rates, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-ml For details on foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-gen-ai
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens

item.title: [updated] Watson Machine Learning (pm-20) has changed the description of the plan named v2-professional
item.description:
*before*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens used. For details on CUH rates and foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/ml-plans
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens
HIPAA support must be enabled in your IBM Cloud account settings. For instructions, go to https://dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/docs/content/getting-started/security.html#hipaa, *after*: CUH billing is based on CUH rate multiplied by the hours of consumption. Resource Units billing is based on the rate of the foundation model class multiplied by the number of tokens used. For details on CUH rates, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-ml For details on foundation model classes, go to https://ibm.biz/wx-plans-gen-ai
1 Resource Unit = 1000 tokens
HIPAA support must be enabled in your IBM Cloud account settings. For instructions, go to https://dataplatform.cloud.ibm.com/docs/content/getting-started/security.html#hipaa
